floater.name: gesture_preview

text.name: replace_text
text.tool_tip: Replace the trigger word(s) with these words. For example, trigger 'hello' replace with 'howdy' will turn the chat 'I wanted to say hello' into 'I wanted to say howdy' as well as playing the gesture!

line_editor.name: replace_editor
line_editor.tool_tip: Replace the trigger word(s) with these words. For example, trigger 'hello' replace with 'howdy' will turn the chat 'I wanted to say hello' into 'I wanted to say howdy' as well as playing the gesture

floater.text: Alle trin vil ske samtidigt, medmindre du tilføjer vente trin.

check_box.label: Aktiv
check_box.name: active_check
check_box.tool_tip: Aktive bevægelser kan blive aktiveret ved at skrive deress udløser tekst eller ved at trykke på genvejstaste. Bevægelser vil normalt være inaktive hvis der allerede findes en tilsvarende genvejstaste.
